title: Query Result
description: Represents a result that can come back from a site for a query

status.description: The current status of the result (especially useful for async results)

resultID.description: A unique identifier for this result

adapterID.description: A unique identifier for the node that this result came from. Only present for success statuses.

count.description: The primary count of patients coming back for this query. Only present for success statuses.

noiseTerms.description: The noise that we inject into the returned count for obfuscation purposes. Only present for success statuses.

breakdowns.description: The optional breakdowns that the user requested. Only present for success statuses.

items.description: The category and list of results for this breakdown

results.description: The name/count pairs associated with a breakdown

name.description: The name of the result for a breakdown, e.g., Male for Gender

count.description: The number of patients associated with this breakdown

i2b2Mapping.description: Use this to run this query at the i2b2 site associated with the result's nodes, only present for success statuses

problemDigest.description: The improved error that was associated with this query failing at the node site
